# Building
Building houses is essential for survival. Not only do they protect you from potentially dangerous atmospheric fluctuations, such as gusts of wind, rains, gas clouds, or perhaps temperature fluctuations and attacks from the wild animals on the planet, but they can also serve as a place to securely store items and resources.
# Security
Additionally, you can use a multitool on a door electronics to change its access requirements (currently you have to use the right click menu for this). Using this board while constructing a powered airlock creates an airlock with the same access requirements. This is useful to create a secure door that can only be opened by a specific group of people, such as security or science personnel.
The access configurator can also be used to change the access restrictions of any locked airlock, door, machine, or computer. You can buy it from the EngiVend machine, which in turn can be bought from the cargo ordering console.

# Tips
While holding a stack of steel, glass, and certain other materials in your hand, you can press Z to open the quick crafting menu. It can help you quickly craft certain commonly used things, such as machine/computer frames, pipes, pumps, disposals, walls, windows, and more.
